30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}”]

Our broad range of expertise spanning a wide range of building systems and materials allows us to offer our clients a single source for all of their façade design and manufacture requirements.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1626518214828{margin-right: 30px !important;}”]

line_alignment=”default” line_thickness=”7″ divider_color=”accent-color” custom_height=”10″ custom_line_width=”50″][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height=”20″][vc_column_text]Over the past five decades, we have developed long-standing relationships with international manufacturers, establishing a reliable and efficient supply chain network across the globe.

Alutech Aluminium And Glass is a one-stop-shop, sourcing materials from these suppliers and ensuring seamless end-to-end delivery of bespoke façade solutions.

Through an integrated approach, we incorporate our in-house engineering capability with cutting-edge processing facilities, logistics management and installation expertise.

Our products and services include design, engineering, manufacture, project management and installation.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner column_margin=”default”
